name: Jungle Genocide
description:
Jungle Genocide is a free AI based,  endless third-person shooter.

You play as an ape who survived a military aircraft crash. Taking the troops guns and explosives,  fend yourself against the other apes and kill as many as you can.

Challenge yourself, and see how many kills you can get in this endless shooter.  If you kill too many apes, you may summon a mighty Jungle King...

---

Explore near the plane to locate ammo crates when you run out of ammo. But don't get too close to it...

---

CONTROLS

WASD  - Walk

TAB - Pause

ESCAPE - Return to Main Menu

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Aim Down Sights

G  - Throw Grenade

R  - Reload

---

Developer Note: This is still in development and is very open to feedback, critiques and thoughts. This game will be frequently and have more features. Please let me know what you think!

Email: junglegenocidegame@gmail.com
